channel.title: How would i go about doing this
channel.description:
hi, how would i go about adding a sitebar type thing (like www.moparisthebest.org) the little tollbar or w/e that you cna move around? if possible i also wanna make it to where say i click forums it bring down sbu catagories
thanks in advance
[right]~Mvp[/right]

item.title: How would i go about doing this
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

Here’s the script i used for that: (it’s a div/layer)

Put this between your tags

[code][/code]

Put this between your tags

[code]

Layer Title X
This is where your content goes.
It can be any html code or text.
Remember to feed the reindeer.
Avoid chewable giblet curtains.
[/code]

To show the layer:

<a href="javascript:showMe();">show</a>

To hide the layer:

<a href="javascript:hideMe();">hide</a>

Read full topic
item.source: How would i go about doing this
